title: MIROPA schema for Data entity
description: Sensitive human data as defined by GDPR

category_of_personal_data.description: Any information which are related to an identified or identifiable natural person (Art. 4 (1) GDPR) .

special _category_of_personal_data.description: Sensitive Personal Data whose use requires specific legal permission or justification such as genetic data, biometric data (where this is used for identification purposes), health data, etc.

category_of_data_subjects.description: Category of individuals whose personal data is being processed, depending on their role in the activity. This includes special data subjetcs (minors, people with dementia)

TOMs_desciption.description: Technical and organisational measures required/followed when processing data, including data de-indentification

disclosure.description: Entities to whom the personal data have been or will be disclosed including recipients in third countries or international organisations
